@TheBloggess I took "paxlovid" when I tested positive, and it cleared up all my symptoms SUPER fast. Regarding the other things you tweeted about, I basically ignored them or drank.

@RebCouncill I've got a little poster that fellow Texan @JaniceSimon gave me that will guide how I spend my money, my investments, and even some of the choices over which I have influence with larger companies. My dollars back human rights.

Well. Now my gay and trans kid is non binary! I'm starting a flag store, damn it!

Keep using your twitter to share your POV. Find the people who are like you. Praise people doing what you hope more people do. Elevate. Share the mic. Bullhorn people with smaller voices but bigger causes.

And be real and real big and real kind. But mostly real.

Hi! @H_C_Carter - I just saw what happened to you this week, and I'm following you to support you. I like who you are and what you represent and I hope you continue to use your voice.
